title: Know the Current Trends
itunes:author: Guest: Jim Burns
itunes:summary: It might not be the most fun part of our jobs as parents, but John and Danny explain that like it or not, we should stay current on what our kids are looking at and listening to especially during their teenage years. Receive the book Understanding Your Teen with your gift of any amount!
